testcase.name: Reset password on forgetting it
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the Application............................................passed When User clicks on MyAccount...............................................passed And Selects login option....................................................passed And Click on Forgotten Password option......................................passed And Enters valid email address "slimtest1@gmail.com"........................passed And User clicks on Continue.................................................passed Then Proper confirmation message should be displayed........................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid credentials - Example #1.1

testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User enters invalid email address into email field.....................passed And User enters invalid password "1234567890" into password field...........passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get a proper warning message about credentials mismatch....passed

testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User enters valid email address "slimtest1@gmail.com" into email field in the login page.passed And User enters invalid password "1234567890" into password field...........passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get a proper warning message about credentials mismatch....passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid email and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User enters invalid email address into email field.....................passed And User enters valid password "12345" into password field..................passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get a proper warning message about credentials mismatch....passed

testcase.name: Login without providing any credentails
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User dont enter email address into email field.........................passed And User dont enter password into password field............................passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get a proper warning message about credentials mismatch....passed

testcase.classname: End to End scenarios for placing orders
testcase.name: Verify whether the User is able to place order
testcase.system-out: Given I login to the application............................................passed When I add any product to bag and checkout..................................passed And I place an order........................................................passed Then I should see that the order is placed successfully.....................passed

testcase.name: User creates an account only with mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User enters the details into below fields..............................passed And User selects Privacy Policy.............................................passed And User clicks on Continue button..........................................passed Then User account should get created successfully...........................passed

testcase.name: User creates an account with all fields
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User enters the details into below fields..............................passed And User selects Yes for Newsletter.........................................passed And User selects Privacy Policy.............................................passed And User clicks on Continue button..........................................passed Then User account should get created successfully...........................passed

testcase.name: User creates a duplicate account
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User enters the details into below fields with duplicate email.........passed And User selects Yes for Newsletter.........................................passed And User selects Privacy Policy.............................................passed And User clicks on Continue button..........................................passed Then User should get a proper warning about duplicate email.................passed

testcase.name: User creates an account without filling any details
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Register Account page...............................passed When User dont enter any details into fields................................passed And User clicks on Continue button..........................................passed Then User should get proper warning messages for every mandatory field......passed

testcase.name: User searches for a valid product
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the Application............................................passed When User enters valid product "HP" into Search box field...................passed And User clicks on Search button............................................passed Then User should get valid product displayed in search results..............passed

testcase.name: User searches for an invalid product
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the Application............................................passed When User enters invalid product "Honda" into Search box field..............passed And User clicks on Search button............................................passed Then User should get a message about no product matching....................passed

testcase.name: User searches without any product
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the Application............................................passed When User dont enter any product name into Search box field.................passed And User clicks on Search button............................................passed Then User should get a message about no product matching....................passed
